org.opentcs.util.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.configuration.Configuration
  • Deprecated. 
    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public abstract class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class declares central configuration management methods that provide the possibility of making configuration data persistent and loading such persistent data. The form of the persistent configuration data depends on the actual implementation.

    System properties:

    de.fraunhofer.iml.toolbox.configuration.class:
    May be set to the name of the actual implementing class to be used. The default class is PropertiesConfiguration in this package.
    de.fraunhofer.iml.toolbox.configuration.saveonexit
    If set to true, persists the configuration when the JVM is shut down.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Deprecated. 
      The name of the property which may contain the name of the desired configuration implementation class.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ConfigurationStore> stores
      Deprecated. 
      A cache of existing ConfigurationStore instances, identified by their namespaces.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Configuration getInstance()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the configuration instance.
        Returns:
        The configuration instance.

      • saveConfiguration

        public static void saveConfiguration()
        Deprecated. 
        Make all key/value pairs for all namespaces persistent. How and where the data is saved depends on the implementation - this method delegates the actual persistence to the class realizing the configuration store.

      • getStore

        public final ConfigurationStore getStore(java.lang.String namespace)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the ConfigurationStore for the given namespace. If none exists, yet, one is created.
        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace for which a ConfigurationStore is requested.
        Returns:
        The ConfigurationStore for the given namespace.

      • getStores

        public final java.util.SortedSet<ConfigurationStore> getStores()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns all existing stores/namespaces.
        Returns:

      • getConfigurationItems

        Deprecated. 
        Returns all existing configuration items (from all stores/namespaces).
        Returns:
        All existing configuration items.
